KeyProjects.Description: AI-powered application designed to enhance road safety by monitoring driver behavior and fatigue.

KeyProjects.Title: Truck Driver
KeyProjects.Description: Mobile application designed to help truck owner operators get better freight by connecting them with carriers, wholesalers and retailers.

KeyProjects.Title: Wine Warehouse
KeyProjects.Description: The Wine Warehouse system is an innovative solution tailored to optimize warehouse operations and elevate user experiences for both administrators and customers. It provides administrators with powerful tools, including real-time inventory tracking, product management, and comprehensive financial and sales reporting. Customers benefit from an intuitive mobile app that allows for effortless product browsing, availability checks, and seamless order placement, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience for all stakeholders.

KeyProjects.Title: Daily Care AI
KeyProjects.Description: Using artificial intelligence, Daily Care AI aims to contribute to people's health and well-being by offering a rapid and reliable health check based on a convenient scanning of a few aspects of the patient’s face.

KeyProjects.Title: Bear Chefs
KeyProjects.Description: A web platform connecting culinary talents, including culinary graduates, with high cuisine enthusiasts. It offers a marketplace to book private dining experiences, cooking classes, and more, while providing chefs opportunities for practical experience and exposure in the industry.

KeyProjects.Title: Auto Marketplace
KeyProjects.Description: The Auto Marketplace is a MERN stack-based car auction platform. It allows users to list vehicles, view details, place bids, and search for cars. The project showcases the integration of a NoSQL database with a modern JavaScript frontend and backend for a seamless user experience.

KeyProjects.Title: Home HandShake
KeyProjects.Description: Home Handshake is an all-in-one platform designed to revolutionize the rental experience, providing a seamless and user-centric solution for tenants, landlords, and those seeking shared accommodations.
